data.Name: Drain
data.Bio: There is more than one artist with this name: 1) DRAIN is a thrash metal/metalcore band from Santa Cruz, California https://drain831.bandcamp.com/ 2) Drain is Butthole Surfers drummer and former Trance Syndicate head King Coffey with bassist Owen McMahon of Cherubs and guitarist David McCreath. 3) DRAIN is a metallic crust band from Maine, made up of Patrick Hasson (Auspicium, Avulse, Field of Spears, Wholy Failure) and Jake Newcomb (The Doldrums, Dreambox). Read more on Last.fm
